Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. We believe it could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its unique value and capabilities, we are offering it to you at an exclusive price of $995000. We are confident that this investment will prove to be highly beneficial for you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $995,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $995,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,500,000
